Lukas PodolskiIndex 36: On 18 November 2009, Lukas Podolski played against Ivory Coast in a friendly match at Veltins-Arena in Gelsenkirchen, Germany. The game ended in a 2–2 draw.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 38: On 13 June 2010, during the 2010 FIFA World Cup, Lukas Podolski competed against Australia at Moses Mabhida Stadium in Durban, South Africa. The match concluded with a 4–0 victory for Germany.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 22: Lukas Podolski faced Romania on 12 September 2007 in a friendly match held at Rhein-Energie Stadion in Cologne, Germany. Germany won the match 3–1.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 3: On 4 June 2005, Lukas Podolski played against Northern Ireland at Windsor Park in Belfast, Northern Ireland, in a friendly match. The game ended with a 4–1 victory for Germany.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 32: Lukas Podolski competed against China PR in a friendly match on 29 May 2009 at Shanghai Stadium in Shanghai, China. The match ended in a 1–1 draw.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 28: On 6 September 2008, in a FIFA World Cup 2010 qualifying match, Lukas Podolski played against Liechtenstein at Rheinpark Stadion in Vaduz, Liechtenstein. Germany secured a 6–0 victory.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 19: Lukas Podolski participated in a UEFA Euro 2008 qualifying match against San Marino on 6 September 2006 at Stadio Olimpico in Serravalle, San Marino. Germany dominated the game with a 13–0 win.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 13: On 24 June 2006, during the FIFA World Cup 2006, Lukas Podolski played against Sweden at Allianz Arena in Munich, Germany. The match concluded with a 2–0 victory for Germany.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 34: In a FIFA World Cup 2010 qualifying match on 14 October 2009, Lukas Podolski faced Finland at HSH Nordbank Arena in Hamburg, Germany. The match ended in a 1–1 draw.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 24: Lukas Podolski played against Switzerland in a friendly match on 26 March 2008 at St. Jakob Park in Basel, Switzerland. Germany won the match 4–0.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 33: On 9 September 2009, during a FIFA World Cup 2010 qualifying match, Lukas Podolski competed against Azerbaijan at AWD-Arena in Hanover, Germany. Germany won the match 4–0.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 42: Lukas Podolski played against Austria in a UEFA Euro 2012 qualifying match on 2 September 2011 at Veltins-Arena in Gelsenkirchen, Germany. Germany won the match 6–2.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 2: On 26 March 2005, Lukas Podolski played against Slovenia in a friendly match at Bežigrad Stadium in Ljubljana, Slovenia. The match ended with a 1–0 victory for Germany.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 26: Lukas Podolski competed against Poland in the UEFA Euro 2008 on 8 June 2008 at Wörthersee Stadion in Klagenfurt, Austria. Germany won the match 2–0.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 23: On 17 November 2007, in a UEFA Euro 2008 qualifying match, Lukas Podolski played against Cyprus at AWD Arena in Hanover, Germany. Germany won the match 4–0.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 31: On 28 March 2009, during a FIFA World Cup 2010 qualifying match, Lukas Podolski faced Liechtenstein at Zentralstadion in Leipzig, Germany. Germany secured a 4–0 victory.
Lukas PodolskiIndex 21: Lukas Podolski played against Slovakia in a UEFA Euro 2008 qualifying match on 11 October 2006 at Tehelné Pole Stadion in Bratislava, Slovakia. The game ended in a 4–1 victory for Germany.
